title: Organic Pesticides | From the Ground Up

tasks.task: Communicating about pesticide use and safety at an Extension office.
subtasks: Advising on effective and available organic pesticide options.
Reminding users of organic products to follow proper PPE guidelines.
Warning against误用有机杀虫剂对益虫的危害。
Acknowledging possible limitations of organic options and encouraging alternative controls.
Providing personal credentials (name and affiliation) upon conclusion.
Hosting or contributing to a video series on agriculture (From the Ground Up).
